backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing two imageâ€‘default update features and their associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for several frontend React components, styles, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the frontend.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx and defining the page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main homepage component with Yes/No logic, couple photo picker using IMG_20260208_030749.jpg, and modal trigger behavior.
frontend/src/components/ValentineModal.t: Modal component showing a celebration image with a replaceable default image and escape/backdrop close behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientImagePreview: Hook providing client-side image previewing with validation, stale-read protection, load/error handling, and preview state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, exposing identity state, login/clear actions, and status helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom Valentine-themed color variables with dark mode variants and animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for the Valentine website.
